While she wasn't looking, Peter had to take aim and shoots her by pressing one of the three buttons. But which one of these three did he pressed?
113.title: Emily's Brother's Dream Plan

1131.content:
Peter chuckled quietly to himself as he peered around his sister's door. He always thought it was stupid how much time Emily would spend in front of her mirror messing with her hair, but today it looked like it would give him an easy target. Still, he didn't want to alert her to his plan just yet.

He took a deep breath, taking careful aim as he began to lightly press on the button for weight gain. The device didn't make any sound as a small red beam shot forth and hit his sister. She stopped brushing her hair and glanced around, before shrugging to herself resuming her brushing.

Peter waited, watching his sister intently for any sign of change. He was just about to shoot her again when she stopped and set the brush by the vanity beside the mirror. There was no way that he could shoot her again without her noticing now. He rushed back towards his room as he noticed that she was making her way towards the door.

Emily was sure that she'd seen something by her door, but as she poked her head out she was greeted with an empty hallway. She looked both ways just to make sure before shrugging and shutting her door as she returned to her spot in front of the mirror. She frowned as she looked herself up and down. She felt like there was something different, but she couldn't quite place it...

She was interrupted by a knock on the door, "Emi, breakfast is ready, come and eat. You don't want to be late for school."

"Okay. Be there in a minute."

Emily took one last look at herself, tugging at her shirt as she tried to get it to sit right. It kept clinging to her belly, making her look like she had a little bit of a pot-belly. Maybe her mom had forgotten to put dryer sheets in the laundry again, she thought as she made her way to the kitchen.

Her stomach let out a loud growl as she sat down at the table across from Peter. She was starving, more so than she'd been just a few minutes ago. She glanced down at her belly, which seemed a bit rounder to her. Maybe she was putting on a bit of weight. Still, it wasn't like she'd really been eating a ton lately. Still.... Maybe she should just have a light breakfast. Though, she was really hungry, and it wasn't like one meal would make that much of a difference.
1131.title: A little pudgy

choices: Spend more time examining herself and risk being late for school
Finish getting ready and leave for school
Finish getting ready and grab a snack to eat on the way to school
11311.content:
Emily took one last glance at Peter before loading her plate high with food. She may be in need of a diet, but she was far to hungry to start now. Still, she couldn't help thinking that Peter was up to something with the way that he kept watching her and smirking. She found herself tugging at her shirt almost constantly as he began eating his breakfast. She swore her shirt was feeling tighter than it had just a few minutes ago, but there was no way that could be possible. Feeling her face turning red, Emily began shoveling the food on her plate into her waiting mouth, and eager belly.

She glanced down at her empty plate, surprised at how quickly she had managed to finish the first plate of food. Still feeling her face burning she avoided looking at her brother as she loaded up another plate of food. Though, as she resumed eating, she glanced at her brother who had finished his breakfast and just seemed to be watching her. He was practically beaming.

"You seem hungry this morning." Peter said, a wry smile on his face as he picked up his plate and took it to the sink.

"So what?" Emily shot through a mouthful of food.

"Nothing. Just making an observation." Peter chuckled heading out of the kitchen.

Emily watched him leave, making sure he was gone before resuming her large feast. Everything tasted so good, but no matter how much she ate she didn't seem to get any fuller. As if to prove this point her belly let out a low growl as she filled up another plate with food. If she kept eating like this she really would need to go on a diet. Still, one meal wasn't going to kill her.

Finally finishing the third plate of food, she stood up, feeling really heavy and sluggish as she tugged at her shirt. Her belly really did seem to be poking out now. Though she wasn't surprised with how much she'd just eaten. Still, if she ate more meals like this her belly might start to get bigger from more than just being full.

She plodded heavily across the cool tile floor and deposited her plate into the sink with a slight clatter as the dishes shifted. She turned on the water, trying to wash the leftover food down the drain when she felt a warmth radiate from the back of her neck. She turned around, looking around the empty kitchen. What was weird was that, that wasn't the first time she'd felt that feeling this morning. Still, there wasn't anyone else around, and it wasn't like it was very uncomfortable.

She shook her head, trying to straighten her shirt as she made her way back towards her bedroom to finish getting ready for school.
She shut the door behind her as she entered her room, the smell of hairspray still lingering from before breakfast. She moved to the front of her mirror to make sure her hair was perfect before she left. She stopped, scrunching up her face as she scrutinized her reflection in the mirror. She was sure her belly was sticking out a bit more than it had earlier, and she saw the beginnings of a double chin forming on her face.

She lifted her shirt, revealing a soft middle as she twirled around, trying to examine her whole body. She was definitely fatter than she remembered, she thought as she pinched her slight love-handles. There was no way she could've gotten fat overnight. Or even just this morning. She must have been putting on weight for a while now and only noticed it now. Still, she was more worried about how her mom would react than anything else.

Honestly, people always told her that she needed to be thin, and that gaining weight was bad, but she had to admit that she'd always been intrigued by getting fat. She couldn't explain it, but every time she saw a cartoon or show where one of the character's got fat, she found herself filled with a strange excitement. That was even why she liked to hang out with the fat kids at school. She just loved admiring their bodies. Still, she'd never contemplated getting fat herself. Though it wasn't like she was really fat. She was hardly even chubby. However, at the same time it almost felt like she was still getting fatter.

She glanced at the clock, dropping her shirt as she realized that she needed to hurry up and finish getting ready for school so she wasn't late. Though, she couldn't deny her curiosity as to whether or not she was still growing and how she was still starving after her large breakfast.
11311.title: A New Hunger

choices: Try to  hide them in her bookbag
Try to sneak them into a trashcan by the front of the building
113113.content:
Emily tugged on her shirt, wincing slightly as the fabric stretched around her bloated middle. She was very aware of the feeling of the fabric hugging her skin. Still, she didn't have time to dwell on it. She'd just have to go on a diet later. Or something. She did one last twirl, taking in her body one last time before she rushed out of her room.

She stopped as she almost ran into Peter as he made his way back to his room. He stopped, looking her up and down with a slight smile, "Looks like you've put on some weight, porky."

Emily felt her face turn red, and rushed past him towards the bathroom, tugging on her shirt as she tried sucking in her belly. She slammed the bathroom door shut, temporarily putting herself in darkness before she turned on the light and looked at herself in the mirror.

She let out a sigh as she realized how red her face was, and brushed the beginnings of a tear out of her eyes. She wasn't sure why Peter was making her so self conscious this morning, but she couldn't deny that something seemed off. Besides the fact that she seemed to have gotten fatter over night. Still, she had to admit that she was doing a pretty good job of hiding her belly by sucking it in. Though, there was no guarantee how long she could keep that up. Maybe she'd have to pick up some new clothes later that would do a better job of hiding her belly.

She turned on the water, splashing some water on her face before grabbing her toothbrush and brushing her teeth. Instantly the taste of mint filled her mouth as the sound of the running water echoed around the room.

She smiled lopsidedly around her toothbrush. She didn't know why, but she always found it so relaxing to brush her teeth. Maybe it was the soothing sound of the water. Or the calming taste of the mint as it made her mouth tingle slightly. Whatever it was, she felt much better as she left the bathroom to grab her stuff for school.

Finally ready, she rushed downstairs stopping just outside the kitchen. She bit her lip slightly as she glanced at the cupboards she knew were loaded with snacks. Her stomach let out a loud growl as the scents from breakfast wafted from inside the kitchen and her mouth began salivating.

She took a step towards the kitchen, glancing around to see if anyone was nearby. She took another hesitant step forward. Then another. She glanced around again before rushing the rest of the way towards the cupboard and threw it open. Her eyes went wide and her stomach let out another growl as she took in the wall of snacks before her. Quickly, she grabbed a couple bags of cookies, wincing at how loud they seemed to be as they crumpled slightly in her hands. She whipped her head around, waiting for someone to say something about how she shouldn't be having snacks this early in the day, but she was very much alone.

Greedily she ripped open the first package and grabbed a handful of cookies. She closed her eyes, savoring the sweet taste as she shoved them into her mouth and began chewing them furiously. She shoved another handful into her mouth before she'd even swallowed the first bunch. She struggled to chew as she felt her cheeks being stretched by the mouthful of cookies. She took one last glance around before rushing out of the kitchen and out into the cool morning before anyone could stop her.

She shut the front door behind her with a soft click and squinted as her eyes adjusted to the morning sunlight. She could hear a couple of birds singing somewhere nearby, and the faint rustling of the leaves on the trees in front of her house as a cool breeze washed over her. She tugged on her shirt which seemed to be growing tighter by the minute before setting off towards school with a mouthful of cookies.

It only took about ten minutes for her to walk to school, though she liked the exercise it gave her. Especially today with how chubby she was starting to look. Her pants were starting to feel uncomfortably tight around her waist, and even with her sucking in her belly it seemed like it was starting to protrude a bit more.

She stopped as the small school building came into view, glancing at the now empty packages of cookies in her hands. She didn't want anyone to know she'd just eaten two whole bags of cookies, but it was hard to deny it while she was holding the packages. People were probably going to give her enough problems just by the fact that she was starting to look chubby, let alone if she walked into school looking chubby with two empty packages of cookies.
113113.title: Makings of a Glutton

1131131.content:
Emily knee she didn’t have any time to eat two more cookies, just as much as she was hungry because of her sudden gain it just happened right in front of her. She wouldn’t want to be embarrassed on how chubby she is, whilst holding cookies as if everyone could think she’s gaining this deliberately. Though she loved the taste of the cookies so much, she wouldn’t want to waste these if she can’t ate them all. The solution? Emily would put these cookies in her bookbag, and will eat it later on.

Now with that out of the way, Emily knew she has another problem. How would anyone react to her chubby body, that just happened without eating anything junk food or more than she normally take. She may have questions to ask about why and how would she be able to get back to where she was, but it felt like there was simply no answer, and even Peter is in middle school, so that didn’t help her cause either.

No matter what happens, she couldn’t hide of her large frame. So she sighed and waddled into the school hallway, and letting herself pass by, seeing some confused look on some students’ faces, and even both shocks and laughter can be heard. But she ignores everything, and just simply wanted to get on with it. Not the way she would’ve liked this the normal way possible.

Emily was sorting out her locker and headed to class for her first period. This where where she got stumbled and greeted by who?
1131131.title: Save It Until Later

choices: Admit that She'd stole the cookies and ask him not to tell anyone
Claim she got them as a reward
Lie and hope he believes that they aren't hers.
1131133.content:
Emily crumpled the empty wrappers in her hands, feeling the way the plastic folded and poked her slightly. She didn't want to get caught with these wrappers by any of her friends or the school staff who might tell her parents about her sneaking snacks out of the house. Besides, it wasn't like she always did this, but she was so hungry it was hard to resist them.

She looked around, trying to spot any place to stash the empty wrappers. There was a bit of trash in the gutters on the road, though her parents had always taught her that littering was bad, and she didn't want to get in more trouble if she got caught littering. She could try to stuff them in her bookbag, but someone might notice them there.

Emily's eyes twinkled as they happened upon a trashcan right near the front door of the school building. It wasn't too far away, and there really weren't too many students hanging around outside since school would be starting soon. Nodding to herself, she did her best to keep the wrappers hidden from view as she began striding towards the trashcan.

She was trying not to draw too much attention to herself, but she found her feet speeding up as she got closer and closer. She was almost at the bin. She glanced around, making sure no one was looking. Just a couple more feet and she'd be home free. She reached a hand out towards the can, opening the flap as she began placing the wrappers inside.

"Whatcha got there?" came a voice behind Emily.

She spun around, trying to hide the remaining wrapper behind herself as she came face to face with Steven, "Oh, um, nothing."

The blond boy smiled, showing his perfect teeth. His hands were tucked in his pockets as he stood with his head cocked to one side, trying to see around Emily.

Emily felt her face growing red as she suddenly became very self-conscious of the fact that her shirt was feeling extremely tight on her skin, and her jeans felt like they were starting to cut her in half. She'd always liked Steven, and she didn't want him to see her looking so bloated. Especially since she was still holding the one package of cookies.

"Then what you got behind your back?" He said, trying to see around her as she turned to keep her body between him and the cookies.

"It's nothing."

"Then you wouldn't mind if I saw." he said, taking a step closer.

Emily stumbled slightly as she backed straight into the trashcan, causing it to tumble over, spilling its contents on the concrete. In that moment, Steven took his chance and grabbed the wrapper from her hands.

"Hey! Give that back! That's mine!" Emily said, grabbing fruitlessly at the package as Steven effortlessly moved out of reach.

"Cookies. Man, my parents never let me have cookies before school. You're so lucky." Steven said, looking at the package.

Emily's hands fell to her side as her shoulders sagged. So much for hiding the fact that she had had cookies. Though, he definitely wasn't reacting as badly as she'd expected. Maybe she could just play it off and say that her parents had let her have the cookies because she was doing well in school. Though if he told anyone, especially a teacher, she might get in trouble with her parents. Of course she could also admit that she'd stolen the cookies from home and ask him not to tell anyone. However, she could also try to lie and say that they weren't hers. Though, one look at her belly would probably convince him otherwise...
1131133.title: Suspicious Actions

11311331.content:
Emily just watched Steven as he moved his eyes from the empty package to her bloated middle. She could see a little bit of skin poking out between her pants and shirt, and she was sure that her belly was bigger than it had been just a little while ago. Her belly was starting to fold over her tight pants, giving her a bit of a muffin top. Steven just couldn't seem to keep his eyes off your slightly chubby belly.

"I took the cookies without asking. I was really hungry this morning, and I just wanted something to eat. Please don't tell anyone."

Steven just stood there for a few moments, continuing to stare at her exposed flesh, "Alright, but you have to come over to my house tonight after school. If you don't I'll tell everyone that you've been sneaking cookies and that's why you're starting to look fat."

"HEY! That's not fair!" Emily said, feeling her face growing red.

"Steven just chuckled, "What, are you scared to come over?"

"That's not it! I, ugh, fine. I'll come over after school."

"Great." Steven righted the trash can and tossed the empty package inside before heading into the school.

Emily felt a tear roll down her cheek as she picked up the rest of the garbage. Why did boys have to be so mean? It wasn't like she was trying to get fat. Besides, it seemed like she was still growing, though that was probably because she'd eaten two whole packages of cookies.

She winced as her stomach let out a growl of hunger. Wiping away the tear she tried to get her shirt to cover her belly. No matter how hard she stretched the fabric though, she just couldn't seem to get her shirt to stay down. On top of that it felt like her shirt was starting to get tighter around her chest too. Emily took a deep breath before carefully examining herself. After a few moments she frowned. There was no doubt in her mind that her budding chest was growing too. Though, was sure that wasn't the only things growing. Her arms and legs seemed slightly thicker as well.

She jumped slightly as the bell rang, signalling that she only had a couple more minutes to get to class. Sticking her hands in her pocket, she slowly trudged into the school, watching the few remaining students rushing to their classrooms as the halls grew quieter the emptier they got.

With a sigh, she slowly made her way towards her class. She was distinctly aware of the new sensation of her belly bouncing slightly with each step she took. It was a strange feeling, though, not really unpleasant. She stopped in front of the open door to her classroom, looking around at all the other kids waiting for the last bell to ring. Emily gave one last tug on her shirt before striding into class.

She tried to blend into the wall, staying hunched over. Hoping that no one would notice how chubby she was looking. She didn't want to try to explain why she was so chubby. Especially since she didn't know herself why she was starting to get so big.

She plopped heavily in her seat, unused to how sitting seemed to squeeze her belly. She glanced at the fat girl beside her munching on some chips before sticking the bag into her bookbag. Emily's mouth started watering as she thought about how hungry she still was. She really wanted something to eat...

She licked her lips as the bell rang and the teacher got up to take attendance. They weren't supposed to have snacks in class unless they had enough for the whole class, but she really wanted something to eat. Maybe she could just ask Susan if she could have a couple chips. She knew that Susan always kept tons of snacks in her bookbag. Though that was part of the reason Susan was so fat.

Susan was definitely the fattest girl in school, so she didn't have many friends. Though Emily hadn't really cared that much about Susan's size and didn't mind hanging out with her. She'd even gone over to Susan's a couple of times to play. Emily hadn't really been surprised to see that Susan's whole family was fat. She'd had dinner with them a few times and had always felt like she was leaving ten pounds heavier than when she'd arrived, though that was mostly because the food was so good it was hard to stop eating. With how much they ate over there it was a wonder that they weren't bigger.

Emily glanced down at her own slight belly. She was nowhere near being Susan's size. Actually, she was still probably on the heavier side of average, not even really chubby yet. However, she didn't really want to attract attention to herself. She didn't want anyone noticing that her clothes weren't really fitting her anymore. She was so hungry though.

Emily glanced up at the teacher who was just starting to go into a lecture about the great lakes. It was so hard to concentrate with how hungry she was, but she didn't want to get in trouble for having snacks in class. She'd never gotten in trouble for anything before, and she didn't want to break that record now.

A couple hours went by and Emily just kept getting hungrier and hungrier. She found herself staring at Susan's bookbag longingly as the teacher droned on and on about the water cycle and how lakes were formed. Fortunately it seemed like her body had stopped growing for the moment, though she had definitely continued to grow after class had started. Her pants were so tight that she felt like she could hardly breath, and her shirt had ridden up to the point of almost exposing her belly button.

Finally the bell rang for recess and all the other kids started filing out to go play. Emily glanced over at Susan who had pulled out another bag of chips and was eating it greedily. Susan hardly ever joined the other kids at recess, instead choosing to stay inside and snack. Occasionally Emily would stay inside and keep her company, but usually she liked to go join the other kids and play tag or red rover. Though there would be no hiding her belly if she went out there today.

"Can I have some of your snacks? I'm really hungry."

Susan smiled, "Sure!"

Susan reached into her bag and pulled out a bag of chips which she handed to Emily who tore into them greedily, unable to restrain herself any longer. Emily shoved a handful of chips into her mouth before mumbling a quick "Thanks" through her mouthful of food.

"You must have been really hungry! I've never seen you eat like that." Susan chuckled, "You'd fit right in at my house though. Although, I guess you knew that already."

"I know, I've just been so hungry today." Emily said, shoving another handful of chips into her waiting mouth, "I just can't seem to resist."

"I know how that goes." Susan said, patting her own soft belly, "Though, honestly it really isn't that bad. I enjoy food too much. I don't think I'd ever be able to go on a diet or anything, not like you would ever have that problem."

Emily turned the bag of chips upside down, emptying the last few crumbs into her mouth before crumpling up the bag. Her shirt was feeling tighter around her already swollen middle and she could feel the cool air on her exposed midriff. She found herself blushing as she tugged at her shirt, trying to get it to cover her bloated middle to no avail. Despite what Susan said, she was seriously considering putting herself on a diet, but first she'd have to be able to resist eating.

Both girls jumped slightly as Emily's belly let out a loud growl. Susan chuckled, pulling out another bag of chips and handing it to Emily, who tore into the salty treat ravenously as she tried to ignore how red her face was.

"You don't need to be embarrassed," Susan chuckled, digging into another bag of cookies, "It's not like I have any room to talk anyway."

"Thanks." Emily mumbled, "I guess I'm just not used to this yet."

"You're not even really chubby, so stop worrying so much." Susan said, though suddenly she glanced at your belly and squinted, "Though I swear you're looking bigger than you were a few minutes ago."

Emily tore herself away from her chips and glanced down at her soft middle. She gasped slightly as she realized that she really did look fatter than a few minutes ago. Her shirt had ridden up so much that she was starting to be able to see her belly button being exposed. She found herself watching as her belly seemed to be growing right before her very eyes.

Emily jumped to her feet, trying to examine her body from any angle she could. It seemed it wasn't just her belly, but her whole body was slowly getting fatter.

She undid the button on her tight pants, relieving some of the pressure on her swollen body. How could this be possible? She hadn't been growing during class, well she had been at first, but then she had stopped. Now she was growing again, but why? She hadn't started growing until she'd eaten the chips. The chips! 15421.content:
It was another typical day at school, as eleven year old girl named Mina was headed back home in a rather bored looking kinda thing. She hated these subjects which proved too hard for her likening, and would thought she wanted to do something else instead. Sometimes these opportunities are slim and that only choice was to attend school, no matter what her judgment says from her opinion.

That is until one day when Mina was headed through the streets, when she had spotted a poster being printed onto the walls, and it was about the circus, who are looking for anyone to be part of the performers for the show. That’s when Mina’s eyes lit up and started to make some thoughts as if she’ll be having a blast, like doing acrobatics or what not?

“Now there’s something I really wanted to do!” Mina says when she think it could be fun, comparing to the school she hated so much.

Now at that point, she would wanted to go home and ask her mother about taking her there, but then she’ll be thinking some doubts and thus wouldn’t let her go if she did ask to fill in an act. So she decides to head to the circus which she knows it was at the park she normally goes on a day-to-day basis.

When Mina arrived there, she can see so much trailers being used for equipments and others to transport these to different places as they go. There was also a huge tent which she feels like there could be somebody in there. So she didn’t hesitate to have a look and try and get as much attention as possible, so that one or two performers would notice.

“Hello?” Mina yelled as much as she continued saying further. “I’ve just saw the poster saying you’re looking for someone to join the circus?”

With an instant response, one came forward with a smile to his face as he appeared. He has his ringmaster’s costume, which meant he’s the master of the ceremonies of the show. He approaches Mina and greeted with a handshake as a welcome to say the least.

“Why hello there, little one! My name is Tony, and I’m the circus ringmaster! What’s your name, sweetie?” The ringmaster makes Tony greeted.

“I’m Mina, and I’m eleven years old! I’ve always wanted to be a good performer, so that I want to do something rather than sitting at school doing boring subjects as usual.” Mina responded and explained why she wanted to join the circus.

“I see!” Tony had that curious thought in mind, since it was one of the reasons Mina wants to come over. He had a string of thought until he brought out a vintage idea which he nodded with a smile. “Well there’s an act I’ve wanted to find, and I think you’re the one I’m looking for. Shall we get you started straight away?”

“That would be great! Thank you so much!” Mina was so much excited, that she didn’t even know what the actual act she really is on.

But Tony had already found an idea and so he went over to find some things, leaving Mina to have great thought of becoming the greatest circus act, and wanted to make her family and friends proud by any means of her dream. It wouldn’t take long until Tony came back and he brought along what kind?

This will take place prior to the events of the 2005 film so once more I'll be using the Annasophia Robb version of Violet Beauregarde as seen here: https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uplo...

Young ten years old Violet Beauregarde was literally the best at basically everything from winning dozens of shiny trophies in gymnastics to the Atlanta,GA 'Best Bubblegum Chewer' contest,the back room was filled with nothing but shiny,glittering trophies and plagues all devoted to her so it came to no surprise that despite her beauty and good looks Violet was spoiled rotten,thanks in part to her equally stuck-up mother who advised her at every chance to beat the competition no matter what but alas it still wasn't enough for the spoiled girl as there was a new contest she was determined to win coming up involving the world famous Wonka tour,whoever found the five golden tickets hidden in a Wonka chocolate bar,but Violet at first made the mistake of purchasing the wrong type of candy bar and this one was the product prototype made by Willy Wonka's biggest rival Acme Candy Co.

who made the world's second best tasting chocolate and candy products,determined to beat Mr. Wonka they had their top scientists make a special type of candy bar that resulted in some really odd side effects,some children complained of growing antlers on top of their heads,others sprouted actual bird wings....all sorts of crazy bizarre things.

On this particular day Violet was so wrapped up on winning her latest award for a karate tournament she wasn't paying attention to the candy bar she just purchased and without thinking opened up the wrapper but was utterly disappointed in not seeing any Wonka signature.

"Hey what gives? Where's my golden ticket? And for that matter where's the Wonka signature?" She said angrily as she walked outside the candy store "This doesn't look like a Wonka bar to me! Huh? Acme Candy Co. Warning may cause mild or severe side-effect. What a waste!" As she sought to throw the candy into the trash but stopped thinking hard.

"Although this does say it can causes bizarre things to happen and I always wanted neat and weird things to happen to me!" Violet thought and without hesitation she bit into the candy bar.

"Hmmm almonds and nuts...not exactly my favorite but if this works....." As she kept on eating the candy bar until there was nothing left and she threw away the empty wrapper and waited.

"Okay this thing is supposed to do something weird to me,so why isn't it working?" Violet asked feeling let down she waited and waited until she felt a slight tingling sensation in her lower gut and instantly felt her body expanding.

"Huh? Wh-what's going on?" She wondered.

"Hey take a look at that!" Yelled one guy on the same side walk gawking at the ten year old in shock.

" What the heck is happening to that little girl?" Another guy cried out pointing wildly.

As Violet looked down at herself she felt her clothes starting to slowly rip apart.

"Huh? I-I'm getting bigger? I'm actually growing?" She muttered as whispering and panicking people began backing up as the little girl slowly grew bigger and bigger until she shot up to around 50 Feet towering above the now tiny crowd and surroundings like a miniature Statue of Liberty.

"Wh-oh cool that candy bar did give me a side-effect! I-I'm a actual giant!" Violet grinned amazed but glanced down at her shredded clothes she was reduced to only her bright blue bra and pink underwear but not feeling embarrassed in the slightest,her smile slowly increased as she stared down at the shell-shocked crowd at her feet(as her shoes had also fallen apart) and thought.

"Oh this is very awesome! I always liked playing with dolls in addition to being the best and I always wanted my very own miniature town to play with!" Violet giggled which caused a tremor to radiate throughout the city,several citizens screamed and began running as the now gigantic girl took her first steps forward choosing to.....

So basically it's about girls aged between 9 to 12 who gets Mega sized either weight gain, giant or fat giant. Before we go through, there are rules you need to read very carefully. Most people doesn't seemed to care but it is important if you do.

No sex and no toilet stuff or any dirty scenes in here. They're kids for goodness sake.

Only girls between 9 and 12 who gets bigger so no underage or older age please or I will delete your chapter if I see one.

I don't want all the characters getting nude but they could ripped their clothes off but leave with their bras & underwear or swimsuits.

No short chapters please. If I see a short chapter containing one line and one paragraph if this isn't big enough will be deleted if I see one too.

Only three transformations (weight gain, giant and fat giant) are in use so please keep it this way.

Only human characters in this one please, not any stupid spieces or andriod or whatever. It's not my thing!

All cannot die in this story and please do not end the story. I want to keep things going.

And that's it all for now, I may update this sometime if I forgot something so please bare with me. But for now, please add the chapters of the story and have fun.
